subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: With a year to go before the country plays host to the Rugby World Cup, New Zealand is looking like the favorite again. The country is hoping to avoid its usual fate of bouncing out early, however.
snippet: With a year to go before the country plays host to the Rugby World Cup, New Zealand is looking like the favorite again. The country is hoping to avoid its usual fate of bouncing out early, however.
